image:image.image:title: Empire World - Erbil's Largest Mixed-Use Development
image:image.image:caption: Empire World: 2500 units, shopping mall, five-star hotel. Under construction with completion in 2027. Starting from $150,000.

image:image.image:title: Pavilion Erbil - 320,000 sqm Lagoon Luxury Living
image:image.image:caption: Pavilion Erbil: 2800 units with private beach, 320,000 sqm lagoon, marina, and waterfront villas. Starting from $250,000.

image:image.image:title: Downtown Erbil - $3 Billion Landmark Development
image:image.image:caption: Downtown Erbil: 4500 units, iconic twin towers, three five-star hotels. 541,000 sqm development. Starting from $200,000.

image:image.image:title: MNW Towers - Smart Living in Ankawa
image:image.image:caption: MNW Towers: 800 smart home units under construction. Completion 2026. Starting from $90,000.

image:image.image:title: Quattro Towers - Four 31-Story Towers in Gulan
image:image.image:caption: Quattro Towers: 1240 premium apartments beside Turkish Consulate. Completion 2026. Starting from $110,000.

image:image.image:title: Hiwa City - Green Living Community
image:image.image:caption: Hiwa City: 2200 units on Kasnazan Koya Road. Known for spacious green spaces. Completion 2027.

image:image.image:title: Majidi View - Near Majidi Mall
image:image.image:caption: Majidi View: 1500 units with premium materials and scenic views. Near Majidi Mall. Completion 2027.
image:image.image:geo_location: Koya Street, Erbil, Kurdistan Region, Iraq

image:image.image:title: Dream City - Premier Gated Community Erbil
image:image.image:caption: Dream City: 3200 units ready. Gated community with international schools, medical facilities. Starting from $85,000.
image:image.image:geo_location: Dream City, Erbil, Kurdistan Region, Iraq

image:image.image:title: Italian Village - Tuscan-Style Living in Erbil
image:image.image:caption: Italian Village: 1800 units with authentic Italian architecture and Mediterranean lifestyle. Starting from $120,000.
image:image.image:geo_location: Italian Village, Erbil, Kurdistan Region, Iraq

image:image.image:title: English Village - British Colonial Elegance
image:image.image:caption: English Village: 1200 exclusive homes with country club, tennis courts, private gardens. Starting from $180,000.
image:image.image:geo_location: English Village, Erbil, Kurdistan Region, Iraq

image:image.image:title: The Boulevard - Modern Luxury Apartments Gulan
image:image.image:caption: The Boulevard: 500 modern apartments with rooftop garden, fitness center, smart home features. Ready 2024.

image:image.image:title: Cavally Tower - Premium High-Rise Ankawa
image:image.image:caption: Cavally Tower: 350 luxury apartments with sky lounge, infinity pool, panoramic views. Ready 2023.

image:image.image:title: Tulip Towers - Twin Tower Living Gulan
image:image.image:caption: Tulip Towers: 600 apartments in distinctive twin-tower design with central gardens. Starting from $85,000.

image:image.image:title: London Towers - British-Inspired Living Gulan
image:image.image:caption: London Towers: 400 apartments with British-inspired design, indoor pool, rooftop terrace. Ready 2023.

image:image.image:title: Lebanese Village - Mixed-Use Development Baherka
image:image.image:caption: Lebanese Village: 3400 units with health club, swimming pool, Lebanese-inspired architecture. Starting from $65,000.

image:image.image:title: Sky Towers - Three 38-Story Towers on 100m Road
image:image.image:caption: Sky Towers: 1224 luxury apartments in three 38-story towers beside Arjaan by Rotana. Ready 2024.
image:image.image:geo_location: 100 Meter Road, Erbil, Kurdistan Region, Iraq

image:image.image:title: Zaniary Towers - Iraq's Tallest Building at 48 Stories
image:image.image:caption: Zaniary Towers: Features Iraq's tallest building at 48 stories and 180 meters. 1600 units. Ready 2023.

image:image.image:title: American Village - American East Coast Style Living
image:image.image:caption: American Village: 850 homes in authentic American suburban style near Salahadin Road. Starting from $280,000.

image:image.image:title: Ankawa 4 Towers - Four 15-Story Smart Towers
image:image.image:caption: Ankawa 4 Towers: 240 smart apartments with pre-installed kitchens and sports complex. Ready 2022.

image:image.image:title: Naz City - 14 Residential Buildings
image:image.image:caption: Naz City: 700 units in 14 buildings. High security and maintenance standards. Ready 2021.
image:image.image:geo_location: Naz City, Erbil, Kurdistan Region, Iraq

image:image.image:title: Gulan Park-WTC Towers - Radisson Hotel and Residences
image:image.image:caption: Gulan Park-WTC: 450 premium residences with Radisson Hotel, World Trade Center offices, and Gulan Mall. Ready 2020.

image:image.image:title: Roya Towers - Five 29-Story Towers
image:image.image:caption: Roya Towers: 1180 apartments in five 29-story towers with retail and parking. Central location. Ready 2022.

image:image.image:title: Star Towers - Golden Square Area
image:image.image:caption: Star Towers: 602 apartments in four 14-story towers. Views of Dream City. 5km from airport. Ready 2022.
image:image.image:geo_location: Golden Square, Erbil, Kurdistan Region, Iraq

image:image.image:title: Garden City - 18 Buildings and 146 Villas
image:image.image:caption: Garden City: 1850 units including apartments and villas. Schools, sports center, extensive gardens. Ready 2021.
image:image.image:geo_location: King Mahmoud Ring Road, Erbil, Kurdistan Region, Iraq

image:image.image:title: Ganjan City - 1000 Acre Community
image:image.image:caption: Ganjan City: 2400 units on 1000 acres with 30% green space. Single and two-story villas. Ready 2020.

image:image.image:title: Kurdistan City - Established Family Community
image:image.image:caption: Kurdistan City: 772 units in established community. Schools, hospital, 24/7 electricity. Ready since 2014.
image:image.image:geo_location: 150 Meter Road, Erbil, Kurdistan Region, Iraq

image:image.image:title: Signature Towers - Premium Central Erbil
image:image.image:caption: Signature Towers: 680 luxury apartments with 20 residential floors, commercial space, underground parking. Ready 2023.
